headline: CS Student and Designer
summary:
Growing up during a time when information technology was developing quickly, I was always captivated by computers and their capacity to bring people together. This inspired me to study about website & graphic design and, subsequently, to pursue a career in it. I have developed a deep love for creativity and the beauty that comes with original designs over the years.  Today, I'm a CS student and a Freelance Graphic & UI/UX designer that is passionate about giving users amazing, visually appealing experiences.

Skills:

Fullstack Web & Mobile development (Spring Boot, Jakarta EE, Laravel, Flutter, Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Dart, Tailwind CSS, ReactJS)
Graphic design (Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator)
UI/UX Design (Figma, Adobe Xd)
Programming (Java, C, C#, Python)

experiences.title: Backend & Mobile Development Intern
experiences.description: During this internship, I worked on the development of the "E-Station" project, a web and mobile application focused on Gas Station Management. As part of my responsibilities, I successfully designed and implemented the backend using Spring Boot REST API. This involved creating functionalities for attendant check-ins and check-outs, integrating the scanning of pump electronic counters, and managing all essential interactions related to gas tanks, gas prices, and transactions within the station. I also designed the UI/UX design of the app, creating modern and appealing interfaces, and coded some of them in Flutter.

experiences.title: Web & Mobile Development Intern
experiences.description: Creating a Mobile app and it's Web administration app of Employee Attendance that I named "EmpMaster", using Laravel as a Backend and Flutter for Frontend.

experiences.title: Web Development Intern
experiences.description: Redesigning and revamping the old Client RADEM plateform.
